sense.def:
To stress a point
pomeni posebej opozoriti na nekaj, ker menimo, da je pomembno.

seg.quote: I ought to stress that this was not a trial but an enquiry.
He stressed the importance of better public relations.

sense.def:
To feel under stress
ali
to be under stress
pomeni, da smo napeti ali zaskrbljeni zaradi česa.

seg.quote: Too many stresses are being placed on the family.

sense.def:
Stresses
so močna delovanja sile ali teže na kak predmet.

seg.quote: Earthquakes can result from stresses in the earth's crust.
It has stood up to tests under extreme heat and stress.

sense.def:
Stress
je izgovor besede ali dela besede z nekoliko močnejšim glasom.

To stress a word or part of a word
pomeni, da pri izgovoru besede ali dela besede uporabimo močnejši glas.

seg.quote: You should stress the second syllable in ‘computer’.
